WindowConfirm.summary: window.confirm() instructs the browser to display a dialog with an optional message, and to wait until the user either confirms or cancels the dialog.

remarks.para: Under some conditions — for example, when the user switches tabs — the browser may not actually display a dialog, or may not wait for the user to confirm or cancel the dialog.

WindowConfirm.returns:
A boolean indicating whether OK (true) or Cancel (false) was
selected. If a browser is ignoring in-page dialogs, then the returned value is always
false.
